title: Comedies. 1st 20 years. Part 3: 1902-1908
brief_description:
Compilation of silent comedy motion pictures restored from the Library of Congress paper prints.
Contents: Grandpa’s reading glass (1902)—Mr Hurry-Up of New York (1907)—The Tired tailor’s dream (1907)—The Sculptor’s nightmare (1908)
